title: Weeping lamb with boulangère potatoes and mint sauce
description: The juices from the slowly roasting leg of lamb drip into potatoes and onions to create a hearty dinner for eight, served with rich red wine gravy and sharp mint sauce.
ingredients: 6 large potatoes, peeled and sliced thinly
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
25g/1oz butter, plus a little extra for the gravy
1 large bunch mint leaves, finely chopped
